segments.text: Here you are . How is Danny ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better now . We are just back from the hospital . We were lucky to meet a well-known doctor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said that he had a really bad cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we go back home now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The dispensary closed . Here is the given prescription .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought some advanced medicine . Is there anything you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably not . Some medicine we need is ethical drug which you can't buy without a prescription .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go back home with Danny . You go to the pharmacy again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , this is the third time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? How come ? The third time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't have to know . Bye for now .
segments.speaker: S1
